name: Aleix Renom Cisa
introduction: I’m a passionate worker who recently finished his bachelor’s degree majoring insoftware development, with work experience in front end development usingReact and TypeScript. My interests center around creating incredible userexperiences both digital and inter-personal, and creating services that arerobust and last for years both on the provider’s servers and in the user’s minds.

education.degree: Higher vocational education in 3D Animation, Videogames and Interactive Environments
Vocational education in Graphical Arts Prepress

responsibilities: Designing and implementing front-end components in React + TypeScript
Collaboratively designing interactive applications for professional clients
Programming the designed applications in Unity using C#
Proactively selling bus tickets in high volumes, during limited morning hours in a high-stress competitive environment.
Management of customers and queues while providing thorough city attraction information and general customer service.
